content.text: Welcome to the page explaining the visualization and simulation metrics parameters. Here you will find descriptions of all secondary settings that can be changed on the graphs page to analyze the LTE network performance results.

content.title: Simulation Duration (ms)
content.text: The total duration of the simulation in milliseconds.

content.title: Num Frames
content.text: The number of frames for the simulation.

content.title: Update Interval (ms)
content.text: The data update interval in milliseconds.

content.title: Num Users
content.text: The number of users in the simulation.

content.title: Speed/Pause/Alpha
content.text: User mobility parameters: movement speed, pause time, alpha coefficient.

content.title: x, y â€“ current user coordinates
content.text: The current coordinates of the user equipment on the simulation map.

content.title: UE Class
content.text: The class of the user equipment.

content.title: Buffer Size
content.text: The buffer size of the user equipment.

content.title: PoissonModel
content.text:
Poisson traffic model:
- packet_rate - packet intensity
- min_packet_size - minimum packet size
- max_packet_size - maximum packet size

content.title: OnOffModel
content.text:
On/Off traffic model:
- duration_on - duration of the active phase
- duration_off - duration of the inactive phase
- packet_rate - packet intensity during the active phase

content.title: Channel Model
content.text: Section with channel transmission parameters. Channel transmission model.

content.title: eNodeB Configuration
content.text: LTE base station parameters. Base station configuration.

content.title: Scheduler Type
content.text: Resource scheduling algorithm parameters. Type of scheduler used.

home.welcome: Welcome to the LTE Network Simulator!
home.description: Simulate the LTE network operation, resource allocation between users, and analyze key metrics: throughput, fairness, and scheduler efficiency.

about.title: Development Team
about.text: This section is still under development and will be completed at the final stage of the project.

loadModal.title: Load Configuration
loadModal.uploadFileLabel: Upload a file from your computer
